about_the_game:
Adapted from the popular comic Sex Stopwatch by TOPTOON.

You will take on the role of Zhu Yurong, a senior high school student. One day, you unexpectedly gain the mysterious power of the "Sex Stopwatch," which grants you the ability to pause time. You must use this power within the limited time of one hundred days to complete both main and side quests, while interacting with multiple girls of varying personalities and freely crafting your own exclusive harem.

Every choice you make will affect your ability growth and the direction of the story, further strengthening the power of the Sex Stopwatch. Not only will you have to navigate a complex and ever-changing plot, but you will also face off against another powerful candidate, Gao Qiangzhe, in a battle for the position of Demon King heir.

Your wisdom and strategy will determine your ultimate fate—will you rise to the top and become the Demon King heir, or be eliminated by destiny? The choice is in your hands!

Class Princess, Zhang Lan

Soup restaurant owner, Liu Mei Yuan

Secretary to the President of KC Group and Head of the Security Team, X Jiang Anna

More hidden female characters will appear during the game as side quests. Want to pursue them all? Start your journey to becoming the Demon King now!

Stats and Quests

Players need to manage their stats while carefully nurturing their harem. Stay home or go out? Your choices matter.

Map Exploration

Players have three action points per day. The main storyline lasts for 100 days, after which open exploration begins. Players can freely visit any location on the map to trigger events, quests, or surprise drops.

Taming

Visit female characters' homes to freely tame them (many different plays) or go on a private date with them (conversation).

Card Strategy

Players will receive various skill cards to manage their stats with the harem. Properly combining them will help achieve more accomplishments.

This game is created using the MASOBU editor. For more editor-related content, please refer to the community links on this page. We welcome all like-minded creators!

content_descriptors.notes:
Adult Content Warning

This game is not intended for all ages and is suitable for adults only. It contains nudity, sexual actions, strong sexual innuendos in voice acting, and explicit sexual sound effects. All characters are fictional adults.

The content includes romantic pursuits, harem development, and supernatural sexual domination, allowing players to freely choose their experience based on personal preferences and comfort levels. Please adhere to the laws and regulations of your location while playing and enjoy the rich and diverse interactive content.

name: 色輪眼

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Demon King is about to fall, and the battle for the heir is imminent. With the "Sex Stopwatch" power, you must strengthen yourself and conquer your harem within 100 days, ultimately facing a powerful enemy to claim the Demon King throne!
